description_data.value: ** RESERVED ** This candidate has been reserved by an organization or individual that will use it when announcing a new security problem. When the candidate has been publicized, the details for this candidate will be provided.

descriptions.value: libglxproto.c in OpenGL libglvnd bb06db5a was discovered to contain a segmentation violation via the function glXGetDrawableScreen(). NOTE: this is disputed because there are no common situations in which users require uninterrupted operation with an attacker-controller server.

Se descubrió que libglxproto.c en OpenGL libglvnd bb06db5a contenía una infracción de segmentación a través de la función glXGetDrawableScreen(). NOTA: esto está en disputa porque no hay situaciones comunes en las que los usuarios requieran una operación ininterrumpida con un servidor controlador de atacante.
